profile.name: Antoniel Zeferino
profile.description: I enjoy creating functional and user-centered interfaces, always striving to improve the experience and make everything more intuitive. In each project, I see an opportunity to learn something new and evolve my skills. My goal is to deliver solutions that make sense for those who will use them, in a practical and efficient way, without complicating things.

projects.title: Coffee Dev
projects.description: Coffee Dev is a mock online store that offers a variety of coffee-related products, including different types of coffee, snacks, and takeaway options. The main goal of this project is to provide a practical platform for me to apply and refine my front-end development skills using Next.js.

projects.title: Project Title 2
projects.description: Save Nature is an interactive platform that promotes environmental preservation. With a modern design, it offers information and inspiration for sustainable practices, raising awareness among users about the importance of nature conservation.

projects.title: Web Store
projects.description: Web Store is an online store that sells affiliate products from Shopee. Developed using React, Bootstrap, and Firebase, the project provides a responsive and easy-to-manage user experience, ensuring a modern and interactive design.

projects.title: Viaje agora
projects.description: Viaje agora is an innovative platform offering personalized travel packages, flights, accommodations, and tourism-related services. The modern and functional design allows users to explore amazing destinations with ease and comfort.
